name: splendide
text: This is the best strip of all time. Todd is even more awesome in absence than in person.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: You can feel Onstad struggling to figure out which awful thing Todd did would be funnier, so he took the high ground and did both.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I like that he picked things that are only a little a bit funny when you read about them but then when you think about how they went down are HYSTERICAL.

name: woodenteeth
text: oh man! you just totally helped me articulate the Type of Humour that I prefer in general. i love a good punch line, but it's the imagination-cue that really does it. Chubby for you sir.

name: invidious
text:
Absolutely. It's extra funny because these are things with comparatively minor consequences when a normal person screws them up, but Todd has somehow elevated epic failure into an art form.

Remember that time Todd jaywalked and six people died?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ouch. i hurt my Laughbox chortling at the italicized sentence.

name: mercuri0us
text: So much so you had to go to hospital?

name: tripperday
text:
It's even funnier if you know someone kind of like Todd.

Remember when Todd drunk dialed his ex-girlfriend and set his trailer on fire fighting cops?

name: valrus
text:
AMBIGUOUS SENTENCE AHOY

Get 'em, trailer! Get those fire fighting cops!

name: dtuba
text: "Don't shooot, boys! It's just tacos!"

name: spinynorman
text:
It's like Barry Bass trying to file for unemployment and getting deported. How the fuck did they manage that?

Remember that time Todd went to buy shoes and they had to close the government for a day?

name: beverage
text: Remember when Todd learned to ride a horse and started a suicide cult?

name: tekende
text: Remember when Todd tried to return his messed-up order at the McDonald's counter and the building owner was arrested for possession of illicit substances?

name: griffypoo
text: Remember when Todd went deep-sea fishing that one time and caused a 2 month PETA riot?

name: hyetal
text: Remember when Todd drank that expired milk and Yugoslavia disintegrated?

name: pigeon_street
text: Remember how Todd tried to learn computers and now he's a registered sex offender?

name: soticoto
text: Remember when pigeon_street forgot to italicise his comment and RUINED EVERYTHING?

name: huber
text: TODD should replace Tony Blair as the next Prime Minister

name: cryztal
text: Now, I ain't no brit, but I definitely agree that Todd should have a high political position somewhere .

name: greyfield
text: Better than Brown, at least.

name: soticoto
text: And definitely better than Cameron.

name: arcibi
text: Todd must have messed his taxes up something fierce

name: dzieger
text: A comment left by dzieger was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alphagator, evolume, farqussus, godfatherofsouls, dr_sexlove)

name: nighttoad
text: quit laming this man! gee golly, as if his outstanding debt wasn't bad enough, you guys have to add insult to injury.

name: dissembly
text:
do six-figure debts happen to people who don't have six-figure incomes?

Penalties interest, i guess it's possible. That is hell of harsh if so, though.

name: soticoto
text: Chubb for "gee golly".

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Vondicus, Ariamaki, woodenteeth, atticusonline, mustconcentrate, gnjdfsgk)

name: songbirdspectre
text: A comment left by songbirdspectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Ariamaki, mustconcentrate, jezebel, Zem)

name: scorpio_nadir
text: You are the Hindenburg of walking into an H & R Block office.

name: spinynorman
text: I've stolen both of these as lies about myself to inflate my stature in the eyes of others.

name: tekende
text: So you...you told people that you yelled at your girlfriend so loud that you had to go to the hospital. And this made the people you told think more of you. I do not want to meet these people.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
You already have.

These people are assetbar.

name: achilleselbow
text: If someone told me that, I would think they were of low mind.

name: sp1derbaby
text: You're tall enough, Stephen Fry!

name: canusdivinus
text: He sells smack out of the back of his van!

name: canusdivinus
text:
Mm, crap. Just re-read the strip.

Runs smack. Not sells.

name: laserblade
text: Quoting Achewood is a serious and exacting process, akin to Talmudic study.

name: bobbieluvsya
text: You have to memorize all the highest rated strips and recite them in their entirety for your family if you want to be considered an adult.

name: jezebel
text:
You have no idea what amazing treasures I would give to be able to tell this to some of my tax clients.

"If you give me your information in a dirty, dilapidated shoebox this year, I am going to mess your taxes up so bad you almost get lethal injection."

name: natashamarie
text: i guess the underground has taxes?

name: ghostd
text: The squirrel police gots to get paid.

name: straw
text:
Once you get below the knee the world gets pretty messed up

All arrestin you for intent to speed

name: bobbieluvsya
text: And someone has to pay for the bunny ambulances.

name: internnumber1
text: Beef is basically saying that Todd would end up being the squirrel James Stockdale. Phillipe would end up having to drive him off into the woods somewhere and leave him by the side of the road.

name: hollybones
text: A comment left by hollybones was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nighttoad, mercuri0us, Connellingus)

name: professorhazard
text: No one said it could be done.

name: feetnotes
text: I just love how bad Todd is in this one.

name: dougthehead
text: What really sells this strip for me is the idea that Phillipe really likes and admires Todd.

name: steerpike66
text: Todd is so bad-ass; even his fucks-up (how's that correct grammar?!) are epic.

name: zem
text: no, no, no, no! just because that's the way you pluralize some things doesn't mean you try to apply it to everything! you are like a person who misuses "whom" and then brags about his careful grammar

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He is worst Merriam-Webster paperback that has been run over by Todd's van.

name: boswelljn
text: he FUCKED those taxes up.

name: philosophe
text: Yes.

name: wae
text: Fantastic achewood scholarship.

name: honesttom
text: Phillipe's sense of resignation in the last panel is gold.

name: tttt
text: last panel made me almost cry

name: molesticide
text:
i love philippe's period on the last one. how he's finally admitted to himself what a terrible person todd is.

this ain't a party of crap dudes.

god DAMMIT, todd.

name: clintisiceman
text: Oh god. I'm just now going throught the archives for the first time, and these last two strips have made my love for Todd double.  Or perhaps SQUARE.

name: clintisiceman
text: Wow. Me a couple months ago.  I was a crappier dude than I am now.

name: mountaindewtab
text: listen i dont say this often but "lol"

name: erinye
text: A comment left by erinye was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Afterward, Deusoma, Ariamaki)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: word up.

name: baryonyx
text: Man, this strip is just a series of minor brilliances. Beef in panel three and Phileppe in panel eight.

name: charchar
text: A comment left by charchar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by JenH, manthrax, Ariamaki)

name: snowman
text: Wow, I would not have thought of that as pedophilic until you pointed it out.

name: heccibiggs
text: Aww that little ottery face of angry resolve...

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
And, ultimately, defeat.

You fought the good fight, Philippe.

name: tekende
text: I completely love panel three. It is my favorite part of this strip. Philippe's final "Yeah." is great too. There is a world of subtle difference between "Yeah..." and "Yeah."

name: the_dude
text: this is my favorite strip.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I'm curious, how bad do you have to fuck your taxes up to almost get lethal injection?

name: aperson
text: I think if you get polonium on the paperwork before sending it in...

name: scorpio_nadir
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: aperson
text: Vetting the vice presidential candidate: very important.

name: rumblefish
text: Philippe's expressions are just perfect here. Panel 7 he's reluctantly admitting that Todd may not be a great choice after all, panel 8 he's realising that Todd really is a ridiculous little man.

name: ham_shoes
text: I bet Todd's girlfriend is a real piece of work.

name: tdoom
text: Panel 3 Beef has suddenly transformed into a creepy father figure
